name: IAttachmentHolder
description: An object that can hold data attachments.

methods.name: hasAttachments
methods.description: Returns true if there is any data attachments, false otherwise.

methods.name: hasData
methods.description: Returns true if there is a data attachment of the give type, false otherwise.

methods.name: hasData
methods.description: Returns true if there is a data attachment of the give type, false otherwise.

methods.name: getData
methods.description: Returns the data attachment of the given type. If there is no data attachment of the given type, the default value is stored in this holder and returned.

methods.name: getData
methods.description: Returns the data attachment of the given type. If there is no data attachment of the given type, the default value is stored in this holder and returned.

methods.name: getExistingData
methods.description: Returns an optional possibly containing a data attachment value of the given type. If there is no data attachment of the given type, an empty optional is returned.

methods.name: getExistingData
methods.description: Returns an optional possibly containing a data attachment value of the given type. If there is no data attachment of the given type, an empty optional is returned.

methods.name: setData
methods.description: Sets the data attachment of the given type.

methods.name: setData
methods.description: Sets the data attachment of the given type.

methods.name: removeData
methods.description: Removes the data attachment of the given type.

methods.name: removeData
methods.description: Removes the data attachment of the given type.
